title: Sweet idea for an ULT
body:
i was thinking and something like this would be sick as an ultimate for an upcoming champion or something. 

Shot a projectile (skillshot) spike that travels .... distance. Damages enemies along the way deals less for each consecutive enemy hit. Champions hit get skewered and are taken with the spike until it stops or hits terrain. If it hits terrain all champions skewered are stunned for .... seconds.

replies.body:
YO I HAD THE SAME IDEA BUT I FIGURED IT COULD BE A NEW PANTHEON ULT

needless to say the projectile would be a spear {{champion:80}}
